replies.text: Let's get Fourth Amendment Is Not for Sale Act, or FANFSA passed through the Senate.

and followed that by saying democrats are soft on immigration bc we want the immigrant vote.

you see the absurdity and self-conflicting stupidity here

someone needs to point out at this hearing going on in the moment.

That Biden & Obama may have deported more.

But they did it w/o killing citizens or sending masked men into r towns to terrorize citizens.

they did it w/o shipping people to nations where they have never lived
they followed the law

post_text:
Rosa Parks was born 113 years ago today. Her simple act of bravery sparked a movement for justice.

Rosa Parks is a powerful reminder that change takes courage. Today, we honor her legacy.

replies.text:
Act of Defiance

Rosa Parks was a civil rights activist who sparked the Montgomery bus boycott in 1955 by refusing to give her seat to a white passenger.
     #CivilRights
This act of defiance helped launch the civil rights movement.
#BlackHistory 

Remembering,
on her birthday, Feb 4
Rosa Parks❤️🇺🇸
Let Congress carry on that act of bravery and start standing up against Trump and his regime.
